entry.title: How to build the LLVM Test Suite with an arbitrary pass?

link.title: How to build the LLVM Test Suite with an arbitrary pass?

entry.summary: Recently, I embarked on my journey in compiler design by joining UFMG’s Compilers Lab as a graduate researcher. My first challenge was to become familiar with LLVM and learn how to develop a pass for it. However, that’s not all, as we are also working with code compression techniques and require an infrastructure to test our developed passes. Fortunately, the LLVM Test Suite is available to us...

entry.title: What's behind the so called 'code prettifier' tools?

link.title: What's behind the so called 'code prettifier' tools?

entry.summary: If you’ve ever wondered the same question as the title, the short answer is: a compiler. Note: I have limited knowledge on code prettifier tools and their implementations. Now, let’s proceed with a brief introduction on compilers and how I used my knowledge to solve a daily problem. This article is intended to be a technical report about a short implementation I’ve made for an open-source pro...

entry.title: How to split strings using regex?

link.title: How to split strings using regex?

entry.summary: Problem Statement What if I ask you to split a paragraph in phrases delimited by .?! ? What would be your first approach ? Also, I want you to include the phrase itself and it’s delimiters (.?!) in the matches. So, you can’t simply call a split function like Python’s one, because you’re going to lose delimiters’ information, once you’ll get a list of strings that preceded one of the specifie...

entry.title: Downloading videos with multi-threaded youtube-dl
entry.summary: Today I’d like to share a trick I’ve learned to download videos faster using youtube-dl. The youtube-dl tool is a command-line utility to download videos from YouTube. But sometimes, when you try to download a large video (something like >=200MB of size), you might face a download time of 40 minutes or more, even when you’re used to download files of the same size faster. So, after researchi...

entry.title: Welcome to my blog!
entry.summary: Today i’m really excited to announce my new personal blog. As you can see, i’ve introduced myself on the About section of this blog. Hope you guys enjoy my content!
